metadata.title: CVE-2022-29078 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description: The ejs (aka Embedded JavaScript templates) package 3.1.6 for Node.jsallows server-side template injection in settings[viewoptions][outputFunctionName]. This is parsed as an internal option, andoverwrites the outputFunctionName option with an arbitrary OS command(which is executed upon template compilation).

criterions.comment: node-ejs package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
